text: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛni ma: «Ɠula, è lo gizei ma nɔ̀un gaazu.» Gaamago nɔ, fiilɛ wolai lokoleʋeni, é ɗa ʋa ga zeeɠaaɓaai, sɛbɛ wɔɔlɔ ʋelei ma é ɠɛni gizeiti ta fasaiti golozu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI luɠɔ, kɛlɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI la ɠɛni fiilɛi zu. Fiilɛi leʋegai ma, zou ɓalii ɠɛni, kɛlɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI la ɠɛni zou ɓalii zu.
